fullplot: It has been described as both a nature documentary and a "fairy tale" look at the story of young girl and her friendship with a fox.
plot: It has been described as both a nature documentary and a "fairy tale" look at the story of young girl and her friendship with a fox.
title: The Fox & the Child

tomatoes.consensus: Jackanory-esque voiceover from Winslet lends a syrupy tone to this mawkish and slow, but beautifully shot, human/beastie buddy movie.
